page.title: 02Brackley's local news.
page.content: A sneakthief escaped from a local estate agent's office with cash and cheques. Police think he entered through an insecure back door at about 1.05p.m. on Friday but he left when he was disturbed by staff. Brackley Park slide was to be removed because it did not pass British Safety Regulations. A councillor said that the advice to get rid of it was over-reaction. He said that it could be fixed for five pounds and it could have a bank against it for extra safety. A lady-in-waiting to Princess Margaret visited Brackley to celebrate 75 years of Guides. She lit the birthday cake candles at the Brackley & District Guides' party. Brackley Football Club has started training for the F.A.Vase. They have never entered the competition before.
